page.title: 14LUCAS AEROSPACE
page.content:
Lucas aerospace is a factory that produces hydraulic components for aircraft.The Lucas site is situated on the Stafford Road,Wolverhampton.The site extends to 31.25 acres.The factory buildings occupy 17 acres the rest is for recreational use such as a cricket pitch,tennis courts,football pitch etc.
The company employs 1546 people.The ratio of male to female is 6:1.
The average turnover of the factory is 160 million pounds per year.The profit margin is 2.1%.About 60% of production is exported,mainly to Europe,USA and Japan.This factory is one of 15 located all over the U.K. The building is comprised of 3 main blocks ;these contain workshops, offices,garages,restaurant etc.
